Package: com.jcatalog.grailsflow.builder

[Groovy] Class TranslationsSectionBuilder

          • com.jcatalog.grailsflow.builder.TranslationsSectionBuilder

          • TranslationsSectionBuilder class is used to get process, nodes and variables translations from translations closure of process definition file. The result of TranslationsSectionBuilder work is Map of objectName -> translations TODO: separate labels and descriptions

            Authors:
            Maria Voitovich
